# CRP - An R-package from the Copenhagen Research Centre for Biological and Precision Psychiatry

**CRP** is not only an abbreviation of *Copenhagen Research Centre for
Biological and Precision Psychiatry*, it is also and abbrevation of
[C-reactive protein](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C-reactive_protein)
which is the perhaps most important blood
[biomarker](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Biomarker) of acute systemic
[inflammation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inflammation). Such
biomarkers are at the heart of the research we do at the Copenhagen
Research Centre for Biological and Precision Psychiatry.

## What the CRP R-package does

The **CRP** **R**-package contains utility functions for statistical
formatting, inference, variance derivations, standardized means, t-tests
and meta-analyses.

## Installation

``` r
if(!requireNamespace("remotes", quietly = TRUE)) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("Biological-and-Precision-Psychiatry/CRP")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`comma2numeric()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/comma2numeric.md)
  : Comma to numeric

- [`do_format()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/do_format.md)
  : Format numbers as text with fixed number of decimals

- [`first()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/first.md)
  [`last()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/first.md)
  : Get First or Last Element

- [`format_estci()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/format_estci.md)
  : Format estimate with confidence interval

- [`format_pval2()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/format_pval2.md)
  : Format p-values consistently

- [`get_coeftab()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/get_coeftab.md)
  : Extract coefficient table with CI and p-value from a model fit

- [`quick_read_excel()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/quick_read_excel.md)
  : Quickly read excel files from network drives

- [`rbindall()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/rbindall.md)
  [`cbindall()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/rbindall.md)
  : rbind or cbind a list

- [`rm.na()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/rm.na.md)
  : Remove NA from Vector

- [`show_na()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/show_na.md)
  :

  Summarize `NA` values in a `data.table`

- [`show_set()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/show_set.md)
  : Detail union and intersection of two variables

- [`totpct()`](https://biological-and-precision-psychiatry.github.io/CRP/reference/totpct.md)
  :

  Add Column Total and Row Percentages to a `data.table` Tabulation
